name: CubeeRun Momories
description:
CubeeRun Memories is a 2D runner with a racing system between 4 opponents, a touch of “die and retry” and controles allow to do pro gamer moves.  All in a cute univers with a fun and epic storie. 

Trough this game who requires a certain will to be finished, we want to give fun to the players but above all, to allow him to practice his memory, his concentration, his reaction time and his patience and not only that ! 

The game consists of finishing the level by dodging deadly holes and peaks at the help of small and big jumps ! 

And to add to the game a bit more fun, the Cubee has the power to slow down time, teleport and dash to 8 directions.

Platform: Windows, macOS, and Linux
Engine: Construct 2
Number of player: 1
Controller : Keyboard / Gamepad
Language : English / French (fr Only for Visual Novel)


Keyboard : 
Litle Jump: Down Arrow
BigJump: Up Arrow
Teleport: C Key Down  + Directional Arrow + C Key Up
Dash: X Key Down  + Directional Arrow + X Key Up

Gamepad : Litle Jump: A
BigJump: BTeleport: Right Shoulder Down  + Directional Stick + Right Shoulder Up
Dash: Left Shoulder Down  + Directional Stick + Left Shoulder Up

MENU / UI : Only Mouse

Twitter : https://twitter.com/cubee_run
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/CubeeRunMemories
Website : https://cubeerun-memories.web.app/

Project Leader: NoobySora
Game Art: NoobySora, Nawii, Valentin Jean-Baptiste, Celia
Game Design & Level Deginer: NoobySora, Hicham Benrhannou, Marwan Benrhannou, Pichy
Game Programming: Hicham Benrhannou, Marwan Benrhannou
Music & Sound Design: Loic Journo
Writter : Hicham Benrhannou
Translator: Keutur
Support : Stanley, Adamou
